ai-tha-ap152:0.3_0: Hearing the couch of the senior monks, the junior monks with seats.

ai-tha-ap152:1.3_0: I’ve given your couch on the couch
ai-tha-ap152:2.2_0: the couch is spread with woolen covers.
ai-tha-ap152:3.1_0: I died at thirty years of age,
ai-tha-ap152:3.2_0: and the couch is the luxurious couch.
ai-tha-ap152:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap152:3.4_0: This is the fruit of that couch.
ai-tha-ap152:4.1_0: I’ve stayed in the twenty-five years of age,
ai-tha-ap152:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap152:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Khujjasobhita.
ai-tha-ap152:7.1_0: the tenth parts of the senior monks;
ai-tha-ap152:8.1_0: The group of seven on the fifteenth day is finished.
